Title: The Missing Rider I
Text:
The hoofprints were discovered far south of the road, and the sons of Elrond believe that the missing Rider might be located within the narrow channels of the Trollshaws.

Elladan has asked you to follow the Nazgûl into the Trollshaws.

Lore: §6Taken from the corpse of the Nazgûl Horse
display.Name: §9Black Steed's Bridle

CompleteText:
The corpse of a black horse lies in the ruins, located among the narrow channels of the Trollshaws.

You remove the bridle from the horse's corpse and decide to return with it to Elladan.
